sections.purpose: To ensure safe and orderly entry into the laboratory.
sections.scope: Applicable to all students, faculty, and staff entering the laboratory.
procedure: Wear appropriate laboratory coat and safety gear.
Remove footwear as per laboratory rules, if applicable.
Wash hands before entering the laboratory.
Carry only required materials into the laboratory.
Enter the laboratory in an orderly manner.
sections.precautions: Do not bring food or drinks into the laboratory.
